caption: I've only ordered food from there. The food is always good and reasonably prices.

This is my favorite pizza! My family and I travel from a different part Brooklyn to get pizza here. My favorite kind of pizza from Nonno's is the regular cheese pizza. My sister and I like the pepperoni cheese pizza. My brother enjoys the pineapple pizza. The people who work here are very nice. Nonno's Pizza is very good! - Ethan J.

We enjoy going out. Yesterday we  found this delicious place which friends told us about. We spent a beautiful experience there with great dishes and a nice team and a distinguished  chef. We put this place in our phone list  and we will definitely return soon. We deeply recommend.
Delicious brick oven food! Prices are not bad either. Friendly staff!
Staff is friendly, pizza is tasty and cooked in the best Italian traditions. I like garlic nuts there and pizza with eggplant. Thank you for your service!
great pizza, great owner!

I'll be quick and brief with this survey. The pizza was some of the best I've had in this particular area. They have the best crust that just hits the spot. The sauce and toppings were great as well. Absolutely love the pizza.
The pizza was super good. We will be back for more.
Best Pizza place in the neighborhood!

It’s ok for Bk pizza spot Five stars for the delivery service 0 stars for the person answering the phones on Friday ( hire a girl ) 8.5 out of 10 for the pizza  Totonos and L & B are  a 10 of 10 pizza imho

This place has really great pizza and has a wide variety of other things to choose from. I have dinner here just about once a week, I work next door, and they are always very nice and welcoming. It can get very busy around lunch and dinner time. I highly recommend the chicken parm with spaghetti (you can also get it with a side salad) and the manicotti wasn't too bad either.
The pepperoni pizza is awesome.  By far the best in town.  Please bring a pizza a day to my home doorstep and just drop them off.  I could live on your food!!
Really good chicken roll pizza was okay

Great food at reasonable prices especially the pasta dishes that are better and cheaper than some of the higher priced wait staffed restaurants through out service. The staff is always friendly.Check this place out for a slice or more...
Great neighborhood slice joint. Pizza is great. Several specialty pies. Menu items done very well. Super affordable.
Traditional Thin Crust Grandma Pizza with extra cheese. Out of this world.

For ordering in and staying home, Nonno's is my favorite pizza in the area. If you're looking for wide-sliced, thin-crust pizza with a sauce that's not too sweet, this is the pizza for you.  I recommend asking for double cheese -- it gives you that satisfying, cheese-pull experience and even more flavor.
Great food
Pizza crust is nice and crunchy ...will be my new go-to pizza joint!
Stellar quality pizza!  Highly recommend!  Deserves 10 stars
Amazing salads and food
Be carful Me and my family got food poisoning twice over the course of 3 years from this place. Never buying food from there again.
Solid, consistent pie. A little lacking in flavor, but lots of care is evident in the box. Delivered on time and the food arrived warm.
We ordered a grandma pie half mushroom half pepperoni. Absolutely, positively fabulous. This is undoubtedly the best pizza in Bay Ridge!
Didn't deliver pizza for almost two hours (via slice).
No masks no gloves, no higiene at all!!!
Really good pizza🤘🤘
Tony makes the best pizza in Bay Ridge!
Great pizza and very nice people working there
Very good taste and best price. Nice staff also
Great thin pizza with unusual varieties of toppings!
Food is great! Pizza delicious!

I Just didn’t know what to eat today so passing by NoNos was ahhh let me try the pizza here since I always enjoy there chicken parm and pasta  First there’s a tall Hispanic looks at me abd didn’t say anything. It’s ok so I asked fir two slices. He puts them in the oven tells me $6,75 takes my money and gives me my change.  NO THANK YOU AT ALL  As I looked to the left the owner was sitting playing with his phone and didn’t say anything. I guess it’s ok by him. At least I said thank you. I won’t be back agn.
Great food all the time and great people
Best pizza after 86th street. I will walk here instead of going to the place on my block.
First time-last time! Pizza was not fresh. Definitely reheated.
Fast becoming one of the better pizzerias in Bay ridge and there's some serious competition
I've only ordered take out, but their delivery is great and their pizza is always great and consistent.  Crust is always good. Never undercooked.
Great food and wonderful people
Best pizzas of all kinds
Nonno's Pizza is absolutely aces in my book. The pizza is top notch and the food is off the hook. Always fresh, big portions and great service.
Excellent
The chicken roll was delicious
Nice little pizzeria
Another Pizzeria store front...don't expect anything different ..just pizza...(the aircondition was not working either)

Nonno's offers great, home-style thin crust Brooklyn pizza.  The "grandma" slices have fresh vegetables and some "gourmet" options like sauteed mushrooms.  They also serve affordable Italian Ices.   This is a very welcoming and comfortable restaurant for all ages.  There is no pretentious attitude, just good food served fresh.
One of my go-to spots to grab something to eat. awesome location, clean, and excellent service. Keep it up!
Best pizza.

This is the best pizza I've eaten in Bay Ridge!!!!!!!!!!!!I love there veggy slice and personal veggy pie. There is also a lot of seating area with AC. Nice spot to chill and enjoy a slice with or without friends.
Ordered food. Never showed up.

Updating my review from a year ago. Pizza is still good but there delivery has gone to trash and they made a mistake the last time I went for a pickup. I ordered a pepperoni pizza and they made it wrong and only did 1/2 topping of pepperoni. Offered to make me a new one but I wasn’t waiting another 20 min. I was charged the difference. Delivery also can take close to an hour even for just one pie.  Most recently placed an order of 8 pies for 12:30. Told them that if they get delivered by 12:30 there would be a big tip. Pizza came at 12:40 and the order was placed when they open at 11.  Such a shame.
Great restaurant! It's small and quaint has a television there. Very clean establishment very good food very reasonable prices. Four blocks from my house best pizza place in the neighborhood!

I thought I  was charged too much for 3 eggplant squares and 1 grandma square and 2 small Poland spring waters 18.75 but a lie of eggplant pizza is about 6 bucks more. I just think it was a tipoff. The grandma pizza isn't so special. ..
Great Pizza and Service!
Amazing Pizza ! Delicious chicken rolls !!!
Great pizza and service. Always fresh
Best crust in Bay Ridge (arguably). But definitely my personal favorite spot.
Perfect crust. Lovely sauce. Just the right amount of cheese.
nice
Best Pizza in Brooklyn
Consistently great pizza , crust is out of this world. Always great service , and in an area where good pizza isn’t hard to come by this place really shines above the others.
Hands down, the best pizza in Bay Ridge.
Best pizza in bay ridge.... great place and the owner and workers are all great....
Best pizza in bay ridge
Great Flavor, Great People!!!!
Very clean a delicious food
White pizza with pepperoni has me hooked 🎣
Pizza was dry!
Great  pizza
They make some of my favorite pizza in Bay Ridge, but seemed to have different sauce or something the last time I went.
Started with two, ended up with having 4. Garlic mozzarella pie was fantastic :)
Great pizza from brick oven. Siciliano was okay. Small place which is casual for a quick bite. Not expensive at all.
Always fresh and always delicious
Best pizzeria 5block radius.. :/ i wasted money elsewhere.
true pizza place. no jamaican beef patties which doesnt belong in a pizza place. they have cable
Best pizza best salad best delivery.
My favorite bay ridge pizzeria
Good food a go to with me and my family best pizza in bayridge
Average, at best
Literally, some of the best pizza I have had. The Larchmont location, I deem, the best of the location for this pizza. A true New York thin crust pizza.
Great pizza 👌🍕
the pizza is really good, the heros are the best in bay ridge. the calzones are just ok, but they have my cans of mountain dew so yea 4 stars!

Probably some of the best pizza I've had in Bay Ridge. The crust is fluffy just like freshly baked bread, and all ingredients are fresh. I'm usually one to leave the crust behind, but it's hard to do so with their pizza.  Recommend the Vegetable Pizza.
Best 🍕 in Bay Ridge
good
Best spinach and sausage rolls, made fresh. Good options for slices as well.
Very good food, service and comfort..

Living in bayridge now for 3 years. Nonnos pizza has the best Pizza and dough. Also love the riceball parm. Service is great and they make you feel comfortable. Prices are more than fair especially for fresh food.
The grandma slice was so good!!! It was very recommended by the local's and did not disappoint. The staff was friendly and helpful. The price was also very reasonable.
delious pizza
Delicious Philly cheese steak sub.
(Translated by Google) Daaaa-lish !!!  (Original) Daaaa-lish!!!
Best pizzeria around.
Best pizza in Bay Ridge !
Always late and cold thanks Nonnos.
I ordered for the first time and the food arrived quickly and everything is delish! I couldn't be happier 😋
Very tasty pizza plus pretty good gluten free pizza
Good pizza not great but good. Priced well though and good atmosphere
The specialty square is outstanding
Grear pizza. Nice people :)
Eggplant mozzarella pizza is amazing!

We've been customers since Nono's first opened. My wife and I really like the food. a typical order is a large pie, very easy on the sauce, as I have a problem digesting tomato sauce. And my wife LOVES the sauce. So, we get a side order of sausage with sauce. It is really hard to find a chef who doesn't get offended when hearing "little sauce please." So I usually have to eat only a few bites before my stomache sctreams "enough!" But Nono's comes through. Their pasta is first rate, too.
Take out shrimp parm is fantastic!

Reliable neighborhood pizza. Take your pick, there's not really a bad choice. I usually stick with regular slices, but grandma slices and Sicilian are also favorites too.  The decor is warm and inviting as are the staff.  Ordering pies are also a breeze.
